segments.text: Liu , two days later , you will be in England . Don't you feel excited ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . I can't wait to be there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think so . I won't forget anything important . As long as I have my passport , VISA card and airline ticket . It will be OK .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , have you double checked your flight time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: More than 100 times . The flight takes off at 12:00 .
segments.speaker: S2
